amethyst_guard.config.title: Amethyst Guard Settings
amethyst_guard.config.option.showMsg.des: Show action-bar messages when mining is blocked.
amethyst_guard.msg.blocked.small: You cannot mine the Small Amethyst Bud.
amethyst_guard.msg.blocked.medium: You cannot mine the Medium Amethyst Bud.
amethyst_guard.msg.blocked.large: You cannot mine the Large Amethyst Bud.
amethyst_guard.msg.blocked.cluster: You cannot mine the Amethyst Cluster.
amethyst_guard.modmenu.summary: Controls mining permissions of Amethyst growth stages.
